column5: ..................or Mike Borger, or Bogner, or whatever the heck his name is?  I remember seeing lots of steelhead he posted last year, but none this year!!?? Don't tell me he's hung up the proverbial rod. Mayby OD'ed on fishing temporarily? Or have to work ..............naaah!
While others wait for reports, Mike is out fishing today.
He is probably fishing in one of your dream locations, while you are wondering where he is! LOL
It's not even Halloween yet man, lol!   October isn't known to be a killer month for chrome..

Nah not really. I know Harold (knuguy), he's just playing around.  Today was stellar, not huge numbers but a bunch of real quality fish that fought like they were possessed.  Was also glad to finally drag Spiel out of the rod shop for a day, Lord knows the man needed a break.  I think I killed him though, he was in knots the entire drive home.

I can testify to this. The spring run,is nothing like the fall run. They are bulls. Im learning again. Yes,I got a few knuckles banged this fall. Nice to see Chris got out. Hmmmm think there was an invite. LOL
